content.body: We audited the IDs in the navigation API PR and preserved as many as we could. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yxnzjRDVmAR5CC9GcAyY448lBD0u0E98eUEMHDhx1Dw/edit#heading=h.wljr2vzc2ntc
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: We audited the IDs in the navigation API PR and preserved as many as we could. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yxnzjRDVmAR5CC9GcAyY448lBD0u0E98eUEMHDhx1Dw/edit#heading=h.wljr2vzc2ntc

content.body: The exported terms did indeed change
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: The exported terms did indeed change

content.body: But WebDriver and other parts of the ecosystem were very broken (using browsing contexts, and thus not working whenever COOP happened) so arguably it's just an improvement to have HTML updated, even if WebDriver was not.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: But WebDriver and other parts of the ecosystem were very broken (using browsing contexts, and thus not working whenever COOP happened) so arguably it's just an improvement to have HTML updated, even if WebDriver was not.

content.body: We did indeed file issues on places like WebDriver.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: We did indeed file issues on places like WebDriver.

content.body: And are willing to help advise on the best fixes.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: And are willing to help advise on the best fixes.
